name: ZULLIA IP TECHNICS LIMITED
about: ZULLIA IP TECHNICS LIMITED is a Nigerian Civil Aviation Approved Aircraft Maintenance Training Organization, adhering to part 3 Rules of the Nigerian Civil Aviation Regulations. As the first standalone Approved Training Organization (ATO) in Nigeria and the West Africa Region, we specialize in providing a range of Airframe, Engine, and Avionics Type Rating Courses on different helicopter types. Our services include training for aircraft licensed engineers (B1, B2), continuing airworthiness staff, auditors, and postholders/managers in design, CAMO, maintenance, and training. We also offer quality management training. Located in Ikeja, Lagos, ZULLIA IP TECHNICS LIMITED is dedicated to delivering high-quality training to meet the evolving needs of the aviation industry. We are committed to excellence in aviation maintenance training.
